Sentencas: La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-delta (LSGMC) powders were prepared by polymeric precursor synthesis, using either polyvinyl alcohol (PVA) or citric acid (CA) as complexing agents.
Titulo: Electrophoretic Deposition of Dense La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-δ Electrolyte Films from Single-Phase Powders for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The powders were synthesized using different ratios between the complexing agent and the cations dissolved in solution.
Titulo: Electrophoretic Deposition of Dense La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-δ Electrolyte Films from Single-Phase Powders for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The obtained polymer gel precursors were dried and calcined at temperatures between 1000 degrees and 1450 degrees C. Single-phase LSGMC powders were obtained at a firing temperature of 1450 degrees C, using PVA and a molar ratio between the hydroxylic groups and the total cations of 3:1.
Titulo: Electrophoretic Deposition of Dense La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-δ Electrolyte Films from Single-Phase Powders for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Phase-pure LSGMC powders were used to sinter (1490 degrees C, 2 h) thick pellets.
Titulo: Electrophoretic Deposition of Dense La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-δ Electrolyte Films from Single-Phase Powders for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The functional properties of LSGMC pellets were assessed by electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Electrophoretic Deposition of Dense La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-δ Electrolyte Films from Single-Phase Powders for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity values and the apparent activation energies in different transport regimes were in agreement with literature data.
Titulo: Electrophoretic Deposition of Dense La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-δ Electrolyte Films from Single-Phase Powders for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The same LSGMC powders were deposited by electrophoretic deposition (EPD) on a green membrane containing lanthanum-doped ceria (La0.4Ce0.6O2-x, LDC), a binder, and carbon powders.
Titulo: Electrophoretic Deposition of Dense La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-δ Electrolyte Films from Single-Phase Powders for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The LSGMC/LDC bi-layer obtained by EPD was cofired at 1490 degrees C for 2 h. A dense and crack-free 8-mu m-thick LSGMC film supported on a porous skeleton of LDC was obtained.
Titulo: Electrophoretic Deposition of Dense La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-δ Electrolyte Films from Single-Phase Powders for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The combined use of proper powder synthesis and film processing routes has thus proven to be a viable way for manufacturing anode-supported LSGMC films.
Titulo: Electrophoretic Deposition of Dense La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.8Mg0.115Co0.085O3-δ Electrolyte Films from Single-Phase Powders for Intermediate Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
